attributes.action: STOP EXPANSION OF THE ULTRA LOW EMISSION ZONE TO THE NTH & STH CIRCULAR ROADS
attributes.additional_details: Anyone coming into or living inside the zone will have to pay a charge or buy a new vehicle that is zone certified  this will affect the low paid, retired, nurses, mothers taking children to school along with workers who commute into London for work, 100s of 1000s of people will be affected, report after report has stated the low emission zone has made no difference to air quality but still Tfl are going ahead with this plan which has nothing to do with air quality but all about  raising money
attributes.background: The Mayor of London and Tfl have decided they will increase the Ultra Low Emission Zone to the South & North circular Road, this will mean anyone working or living in the area will need to buy a new vehicle or pay extra charge every day? this will affect 100s of 1000s of people, the low paid etc

rejection.details:
This is the responsibility of the Mayor of London and not the UK Government or Parliament.

You can petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
